DIA_Severin_Hello_15_00: You have something that doesn't belong to you!
DIA_Severin_Hello_13_05: Ha, ha! That's how it is.
DIA_Severin_Hello_13_06: Look, the permit is mine and I won it fair and square. A bet's a bet.
DIA_Severin_Hello_13_07: Now get out of my sight.
DIA_Severin_Hello_fight_15_00: I think I need to punch you in the face...
DIA_Severin_Hello_fight_15_02: That's exactly what you need right now.
DIA_Severin_Hello_fight_13_03: Come on, lowlife, show me what you got!
DIA_Severin_Hello_paper_15_00: How much do you think such a permit is worth?
DIA_Severin_Hello_paper_NO_15_00: You must be out of your mind...
DIA_Severin_Hello_paper_NO_13_01: It's a shame. There will be another buyer.
DIA_Severin_Hello_paper_YES_13_01: There you go, here's your permit. So give the gold.
DIA_Severin_Hello_paper_YES_13_02: Business with you is a pleasure.
DIA_Severin_BuyPaper_Description: All right, give me that permit. (100 GP)
DIA_Severin_BuyPaper_15_00: All right, give me that permit.
DIA_Severin_Ambient_03_02: Do you want to get hit in the head, or are you just gonna walk out of here?
DIA_Severin_Ambient_03_03: Scumbags like you should be locked up in the city dungeons.
